content.content: In the United States 900,000 people are affected by blood clots (VTE) a year.[^106] Embedded content: https://youtu.be/7lJfh00F7Zg A blood clot forms when blood cells clump together and change the blood flow in a vein.[^107][^108][^109] [Impact of Blood Clots on the United States from the CDC](https://www.cdc.gov/ncbddd/dvt/infographic-impact.html "Impact of Blood Clots on the United States from the CDC") Embedded content: https://youtu.be/s92FVF_NB04 ![Blood clot](//images.ctfassets.net/xbvvg00rroa3/2npwuuP9WsAoYokYS0awas/788e1805ba3cb7a3dfeffa7c348fa895/Blood_clot.jpg) ### Symptoms: - Pain - Swelling - Discoloration (blue or red) - Warmth [^107][^108][^109] ![DVT Stock](//images.ctfassets.net/xbvvg00rroa3/1RK4SMzNEwWAuW6OCwMsE2/2f3bd29aee31e0a9f1ba72f5cf823014/DVT_Stock.jpg) Embedded content: https://youtu.be/cLbncqbBYg0?list=LL31GglpqkW9B1NW8eHUZ-CA ## Pulmonary Embolism (PE) A pulmonary embolism (lung clot) is when a blood clot (venous thromboembolism) moves to the lungs.[^107][^108][^109] ### Symptoms: - Shortness of breath - Chest pain - Unexplained cough - Unexplained rapid heart rate. [^107][^108][^109][^111] ### Blood Clot Prevention: Embedded content: https://youtu.be/vNArtKdLPC8 1\. What will be done to prevent blood clots?[^107][^108][^109][^111] 2\. Will you or the patient be taking a blood thinning medication?[^107][^108][^109][^111] 3\. Make sure the patient's compression stockings and boots (sequential compression devices) are plugged in and working while the patient is in bed or sitting in a chair.[^7][^10] 4\. Only walking is not enough to prevent blood clots.[^107][^108] 5\. Aspirin alone will not prevent blood clots.[^113] __Use the Hospital Plan of Care form to advocate and ask questions about your loved one.__ [The Hospital Plan of Care form](https://patientsafetymovement.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/POC-Blank-April-19.pdf "The Hospital Plan of Care form") [Guide to Medical Care at a Distance](https://patientsafetymovement.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Guide-to-Medical-Care-at-a-Distance.pdf "Guide to Medical Care at a Distance") [Blood Clot information from the National Blood Clot Alliance](https://www.stoptheclot.org/spreadtheword/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/NBCA-Infographic.pdf) [Acute Blood Clots from Choosing Wisely by the American Board of Internal Medicine (ABIM)](http://www.choosingwisely.org/patient-resources/acute-blood-clots/) [Deep Vein Thrombosis Information from the National Library of Medicine](https://www.nlm.nih.gov/medlineplus/deepveinthrombosis.html) [^7]: Hallisey J.
